actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-34.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Public Works for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the Senate Committee on Public Works, or any subcommittee thereof, from March 1, 1973, through February 28, 1974, to make expenditures for investigations within its jurisdiction. Limits such expenditures to $625,000, and requires a report to the Senate by February 28, 1974, on the committee's findings and recommendations for legislation.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Public Works for inquiries and investigations.
